name: CyclingGearRatio
0:
”Alexa ask cycling gear ratio front 42 rear 39”
”Alexa ask cycling gear ratio front chainring 42 rear cassette 39”
”Alexa open cycling gear ratio”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cycling gear ratio
des: Users supply a front chainring and rear cassette tooth count and the skill computes the gear ratio to three decimal places.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
